item1.testimonial: InterviewAI helped me land my dream job at a top tech company. The realistic interview scenarios and detailed feedback improved my confidence tremendously. I felt so much more prepared walking into my actual interviews.

item2.testimonial: I recommend InterviewAI to all my clients. The AI interviewer asks incredibly relevant questions and provides constructive feedback that helps candidates identify their weak points. It's like having a professional interviewer available 24/7.

item6.name: Robert Thompson
item6.testimonial: The mock interviews feel incredibly realistic. The AI asks follow-up questions and challenges your answers just like a real interviewer would. After practicing with InterviewAI, my actual interviews felt much more manageable.
